title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
items.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

items.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
items.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

items.title: ‘It’s been a scary ride’: My family has $800K in stocks. We lost 2 years of market gains in a few weeks. Do we sell — or buy?
items.description: “I’m considering encouraging my family to liquidate part of their real-estate holdings to further invest in equities.”

items.title: Bond yields rise after Senate Democrats appear poised to back funding bill
items.description: Bond yields rose on Friday, responding to the general risk-on environment on news a U.S. government shutdown will be avoided.

items.title: ‘He is a Democrat and claims to be a nihilist’: I told my friend to sell his Tesla shares. He cut off contact. Is that normal?
items.description: “I’ve been trying to get him to diversify his retirement portfolio.”

items.title: There could be a nearly $1 trillion sale in U.S. stocks, regardless of what Americans do
items.description: Foreign investors reallocating money away from the U.S. could fuel a $1 trillion sell order on U.S. equities, a UBS strategist said Friday.

items.title: My stepmother inherited 100% of my father’s estate. She’s leaving everything to her two kids. Is that fair?
items.description: “I had a wonderful relationship with my father.”

items.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
items.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

items.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
items.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

items.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
items.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...
